Jan. 24, 2016 D The British Open Youth at the Guild Festival
The British Open Youth at the Guild Festival 100 Entertainments Contest Brass at the Guild (Preston) the-british-open-at-the-guild-festival
None
Guild Hall (Charter Theatre), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK First Prize: £400; Second Prize: £200; Third Prize: £150. Pre-Drawn; Start: 3.15pm approx.
Best Soloist: Grace Jeffers (Tenor Horn) - Wigan Youth Zone Brass Squire Eccles Scholarship: Grace Jeffers (Tenor Horn) - Wigan Youth Zone Brass Youngest Player: Dobcross Youth
